DESCRIPTION: An introductory text for first-time combiners. Improves your success rate.
NAME: Book of Combos 1

DESCRIPTION: A basic text. Owning item 1 and this improves your combining success rate.
NAME: Book of Combos 2

DESCRIPTION: An intermediate text. Owning items 1, 2 and this improves your combining success rate.
NAME: Book of Combos 3

DESCRIPTION: An advanced text. Owning items 1-3 and this improves your combining success rate.
NAME: Book of Combos 4

DESCRIPTION: A pro-level text. Owning items 1-4 and this improves your combining success rate.
NAME: Book of Combos 5

DESCRIPTION: An issue of Hunting Life magazine which explains how to maximize Item Box space.
NAME: Organizer Guide

DESCRIPTION: An issue of Hunting Life magazine containing advanced item-cramming techniques.
NAME: Pack Rat Guide

DESCRIPTION: Restores a small amount of Health. Try to combine these into something Mega-better!
NAME: Potion

DESCRIPTION: Restores a moderate amount of Health. This potion is a hunter's best friend.
NAME: Mega Potion

DESCRIPTION: Very slightly increases your maximum Health level.
NAME: Nutrients

DESCRIPTION: Slightly increases your maximum Health level.
NAME: Mega Nutrients

DESCRIPTION: Removes all traces of poison from your system.
NAME: Antidote

DESCRIPTION: Boosts your natural ability to heal.
NAME: Immunizer

DESCRIPTION: Lets you run without tiring for a short time.
NAME: Dash Juice

DESCRIPTION: Lets you run without tiring for longer than with regular Dash Juice.
NAME: Mega Dash Juice

DESCRIPTION: Boosts your Attack by filling you with -- guess what? -- demonic strength.
NAME: Demondrug

DESCRIPTION: Boosts your Attack even more than a regular Demondrug.
NAME: Mega Demondrug

DESCRIPTION: Temporarily endows you with the strength of a mighty god. Potent!
NAME: Might Pill

DESCRIPTION: Boosts your Defense by turning your skin as hard as rock.
NAME: Armorskin

DESCRIPTION: Boosts your Defense even more than a regular Armorskin.
NAME: Mega Armorskin

DESCRIPTION: Boosts your Defense even more than a regular Armorskin.
NAME: Adamant Pill

DESCRIPTION: Provides temporary relief from extreme heat.
NAME: Cool Drink

DESCRIPTION: Provides temporary relief from extreme cold.
NAME: Hot Drink

DESCRIPTION: Immediately removes any ice or mud on your body. Clean as a whistle!
NAME: Cleanser

DESCRIPTION: An item that cures Soiled. Releases a puff of deoderizing smoke when thrown down.
NAME: Deoderant

DESCRIPTION: Temporarily sharpens your sixth sense and attunes you to the ways of monsters.
NAME: Psychoserum

DESCRIPTION: Removes all traces of poison and restores a slight amount of Health.
NAME: Herbal Medicine

DESCRIPTION: Fully restores health and increases your maximum Health level all the way.
NAME: Max Potion

DESCRIPTION: Fully restores Health and Stamina, and raises the max levels of both all the way.
NAME: Ancient Potion

DESCRIPTION: Works with other materials to enhance their effects. Cannot be used by itself.
NAME: Catalyst

DESCRIPTION: This bottle is all you'll need to wake up! Shakes off sleep and restores Stamina.
NAME: Energy Drink

DESCRIPTION: A dangerous substance that explodes when struck or heated.
NAME: Gunpowder

DESCRIPTION: Mysterious crystals long worshipped as a source of life.
NAME: Lifecrystals

DESCRIPTION: A Lifecrystal combination used as medicine. Heals with a single touch.
NAME: Lifepowder

DESCRIPTION: A medicine with strong curative properties. Studied in secret, it is said to restore youth.
NAME: Dust of Life

DESCRIPTION: Medicine that works as an anesthetic when combined.
NAME: Tranquilizer

DESCRIPTION: A modest good-luck charm. What does it do? Finish the Quest and you'll find out.
NAME: Mystery Charm

DESCRIPTION: A curious good-luck charm. What does it do? Finish the Quest and you'll find out.
NAME: Shining Charm

DESCRIPTION: A powerful good-luck charm. What does it do? Finish the Quest and you'll find out.
NAME: Timeworn Charm

DESCRIPTION: An amulet that raises Attack. Just carrying this gives you demonic strength.
NAME: Powercharm

DESCRIPTION: A powerful amulet that raises Attack. Made with a Deviljho Talon.
NAME: Powertalon

DESCRIPTION: An amulet that raises Defense. Just carrying this hardens your skin like rock.
NAME: Armorcharm

DESCRIPTION: A powerful amulet that raises Defense. Made with a Deviljho Talon.
NAME: Armortalon

DESCRIPTION: Meat carved from a monster. Can be cooked, combined, or use to set a trap.
NAME: Raw Meat

DESCRIPTION: Raw Meat that poisons whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.
NAME: Poison Meat

DESCRIPTION: Raw Meat that paralyzes whatever eats it. Makes great bait for traps.
NAME: Tinged Meat

DESCRIPTION: Raw Meat that puts whatever eats it to sleep. Makes great bait for traps.
NAME: Drugged Meat

DESCRIPTION: Provides a small boost to your Stamina. This one's still red in the middle.
NAME: Rare Steak

DESCRIPTION: Provides a moderate boost to your Stamina. Meat done right!
NAME: Well-Done Steak

DESCRIPTION: Meat that has been burnt to a crisp. It might boost your Stamina, or it might drain it...
NAME: Burnt Meat

DESCRIPTION: Meat that cools the body, wards off heat, and boosts a moderate amount of Stamina.
NAME: Chilled Meat

DESCRIPTION: Meat that warms the body, wards off the cold, and boosts a moderate amount of Stamina.
NAME: Hot Meat

DESCRIPTION: An unusually-shaped weapon from abroad that returns to its user when thrown.
NAME: Boomerang

DESCRIPTION: A standard throwing knife. Flies straight and true.
NAME: Throwing Knife

DESCRIPTION: A throwing knife with a venom-coated blade. Poisons targets.
NAME: Poison Knife

DESCRIPTION: A throwing knife whose blade has been dusted with sleeping agents.
NAME: Sleep Knife

DESCRIPTION: A throwing knife coated with toxins that paralyze a target.
NAME: Paralysis Knife

DESCRIPTION: A throwing knife used for capturing monsters ensnared in traps.
NAME: Tranq Knife

DESCRIPTION: A base material for making hand-thrown bombs.
NAME: Bomb Casing

DESCRIPTION: Toss this scented paint at a monster to mark it, allowing you to track its position.
NAME: Paintball

DESCRIPTION: Flashes brightly on impact. Toss this right under a monster's nose to blind it.
NAME: Flash Bomb

DESCRIPTION: A grenade-like item that emits a high frequency blast of sound on detonation.
NAME: Sonic Bomb

DESCRIPTION: That's right: monster poop. The odor reveals too much much about the monster's diet.
NAME: Dung

DESCRIPTION: Releases an odor monster find repulsive. It may even drive them away... or not.
NAME: Dung Bomb

DESCRIPTION: Creates a large cloud of smoke wherever it lands.
NAME: Smoke Bomb

DESCRIPTION: Instantly transports you back to base camp.
NAME: Farcaster

DESCRIPTION: A hand grenade used to capture monsters ensnared in traps.
NAME: Tranq Bomb

DESCRIPTION: A very sticky web.
NAME: Spider Web

DESCRIPTION: A sturdy net able to support a certain amount of weight without breaking.
NAME: Net

DESCRIPTION: A tool you'll need to put a Pitfall Trap or other traps together with.
NAME: Trap Tool

DESCRIPTION: Activates when something heavy walks across. use this to capture monsters.
NAME: Pitfall Trap

DESCRIPTION: Immobilizes a target. You can use this to capture monsters.
NAME: Shock Trap

DESCRIPTION: How many whiffs does it take to find out what as in this empty barrel? Just one!
NAME: Small Barrel

DESCRIPTION: How many licks does it take to find out what was in this empty barrel? Just one!
NAME: Large Barrel

DESCRIPTION: A small time bomb. You can use it underwater.
NAME: Barrel Bomb S

DESCRIPTION: A powered-up Barrel Bomb S. Small, but it packs a punch. You can use it underwater.
NAME: Barrel Bomb S+

DESCRIPTION: A potent bomb that detonates on impact. Waterproofed, so it still works underwater.
NAME: Barrel Bomb L

DESCRIPTION: A powered-up Barrel Bomb L. Deadly. Waterproof, so it still works underwater.
NAME: Barrel Bomb L+

DESCRIPTION: An improved version of the Bounce Bomb. Requires some skill to use.
NAME: Bounce Bomb+

DESCRIPTION: Emits a scent Felynes love. Try hitting monsters with it.
NAME: Felvine Bomb

DESCRIPTION: A berry that is hollow on the inside.
NAME: Huskberry

DESCRIPTION: Non-specialized ammo. More powerful than Lv1.
NAME: Normal S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Non-specialized ammo that richochets, resulting in high damage.
NAME: Normal S Lv3

DESCRIPTION: Armor-piercing ammo that deals multiple hits to some monsters.
NAME: Pierce S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Armor-piercing ammo. Higher-level ammo deals additional hits.
NAME: Pierce S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Armor-piercing ammo. This highest level deals the most hits.
NAME: Pierce S Lv3

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that his a wide area. Deals multiple hits at close range.
NAME: Pellet S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that hits a wide area. Higher-level ammo deals additional hits.
NAME: Pellet S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that hits a wide area. This highest level deals the most hits.
NAME: Pellet S Lv3

DESCRIPTION: Powerful ammo that lodges in a target, then explodes.
NAME: Crag S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Very powerful ammo that lodges in a target, then explodes.
NAME: Crag S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Extremely powerful ammo that lodges in a target, then explodes.
NAME: Crag S Lv3

DESCRIPTION: Fragments into three shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!
NAME: Clust S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Fragments into four shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!
NAME: Clust S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Fragments into five shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!
NAME: Clust S Lv3

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that packs extra punch against monsters susceptible to Fire.
NAME: Flaming S

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that packs extra punch against monsters susceptible to Water.
NAME: Water S

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that packs extra punch against monsters susceptible to Thunder.
NAME: Thunder S

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that packs extra punch against monsters susceptible to Ice.
NAME: Freeze S

DESCRIPTION: Mysterious ammo that won't work in regular bowguns.
NAME: Dragon S

DESCRIPTION: Ammo dipped in poison. Some targets require multiple shots.
NAME: Poison S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Ammo dipped in deadly poison. Some targets require multiple shots.
NAME: Poison S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that causes paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots.
NAME: Para S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that paralyzes quickly. Some targets require multiple shots.
NAME: Para S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Ammo containing a sleeping agent. Some targets require multiple shots.
NAME: Sleep S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Ammo packed with sleeping agents. Some targets require multiple shots.
NAME: Sleep S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Special ammo that drains monsters' stamina.
NAME: Exhaust S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Enhanced special ammo that drains monsters' stamina.
NAME: Exhaust S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Special ammo that ejects sharp blades on impact. Can it sever tails?
NAME: Slicing S

DESCRIPTION: Ammo patterned after Wyvern's Fire. Not as potent, but can be rapid-fired.
NAME: WyvernFire

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that restores a small amount of Health to the target.
NAME: Recover S Lv1

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that restores a moderate amount of Health to the target.
NAME: Recover S Lv2

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that fills the target with savage amounts of strength.
NAME: Demon S

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that hardens the skin, guarding against attacks and Wind Pressure.
NAME: Armor S

DESCRIPTION: Ammo that marks a monster's position on your Map for a limited time.
NAME: Paint S

DESCRIPTION: Bowgun ammo used to capture monsters ensnared in traps.
NAME: Tranq S

DESCRIPTION: A regular old empty phial.
NAME: Empty Phial

DESCRIPTION: An arrow coating that increases the Attack of arrows fired. Capacity 50.
NAME: Power Coating

DESCRIPTION: An arrow coating that increases close-range power and melee Sharpness. Capacity 20.
NAME: C.Range Coating

DESCRIPTION: An arrow coating that applies Poison effects to arrows fired. Capacity 20.
NAME: Poison Coating

DESCRIPTION: An arrow coating that applies Paralysis effects to arrows fired. Capacity 20.
NAME: Para Coating

DESCRIPTION: An arrow coating that applies Sleep effects to arrows fired. Capacity 20.
NAME: Sleep Coating

DESCRIPTION: An arrow coating that causes arrows fired to drain monsters' stamina. Capacity 20.
NAME: Exhaust Coating

DESCRIPTION: An arrow coating that marks a monster's position on the map for a limited time. Capacity 99.
NAME: Paint Coating

DESCRIPTION: A fishing lure. Wriggles underwater, enticing those fishies to bite.
NAME: Worm

DESCRIPTION: A fishing lure. Causes a feeding frenzy. No fish can resist this one!
NAME: Mega Fishing Fly

DESCRIPTION: Know any monsters good at fishing? Try fighting fire with fire.
NAME: Frog

DESCRIPTION: A fishing lure with chum that makes Sushifish go "mmm".
NAME: Sushifish Bait

DESCRIPTION: A fishing lure with chum that makes fish that rupture on death go "mmm".
NAME: Burst Bait

DESCRIPTION: A fishing lure with chum that makes Goldenfish go "mmm".
NAME: Goldenfish Bait

DESCRIPTION: A cheap pickaxe with an easily nicked blade.
NAME: Old Pickaxe

DESCRIPTION: A pickaxe with a reasonably strong blade.
NAME: Iron Pickaxe

DESCRIPTION: A pickaxe tempered with steel. This one won't nick easily.
NAME: Mega Pickaxe

DESCRIPTION: A cheap net for catching bugs. it tears easily.
NAME: Old Bug Net

DESCRIPTION: A durable net for catching bugs.
NAME: Bug Net

DESCRIPTION: An extremely durable net for catching bugs. This one is made t olast.
NAME: Mega Bug Net

DESCRIPTION: Just what you need to cook meat. A must-have item for any hungry hunter.
NAME: BBQ Spit

DESCRIPTION: A standard-sized Whetstone. Use it to restore a weapon's Sharpness.
NAME: Whetstone

DESCRIPTION: Allow you to see farther and observe from a distance.
NAME: Binoculars

DESCRIPTION: Junk created when a combination attempt fails.
NAME: Garbage

DESCRIPTION: Used to attract certain monsters - blow at your own risk. May break when used.
NAME: Field Horn

DESCRIPTION: Restores Health to those who hear it. May break when used.
NAME: Health Horn

DESCRIPTION: Eliminates poison in the blood of those who hear it. May break when used.
NAME: Antidote Horn

DESCRIPTION: Increases the strength of those who hear it. May break when used.
NAME: Demon Horn

DESCRIPTION: Bolsters the defenses of those who hear it. May break when used.
NAME: Armor Horn

DESCRIPTION: Full of nutrients, but indigestible in this form.
NAME: Honey

DESCRIPTION: Restores a very small amount of Health, but the flavor's not too hot.
NAME: Herb

DESCRIPTION: A plant used in antidotes. Sometimes cures poison when eaten by itself.
NAME: Antidote Herb

DESCRIPTION: A wondrous, flammable plant.
NAME: Fire Herb

DESCRIPTION: A vine of tough fibers. Woven, it is sturdy enough to hold a person's weight.
NAME: Ivy

DESCRIPTION: A plant containing sleeping agents.
NAME: Sleep Herb

DESCRIPTION: The sap it secretes is a strong adhesive. Careful you don't glue your pouch shut!
NAME: Sap Plant

DESCRIPTION: Melynxes' favorite food -- they just have to steal it.
NAME: Felvine

DESCRIPTION: A night-blooming flower from a special herb native to Moga. It may have healing properties.
NAME: Gloamgrass Bud

DESCRIPTION: Blazingly spicy. Sure, it'll warm you up, but it's too hot to handle on its own.
NAME: Hot Pepper

DESCRIPTION: A well-known combo material used to augment power. The deeper the blue, the better.
NAME: Blue Mushroom

DESCRIPTION: A hard-to-find mushroom with the power to generate blazing heat.
NAME: Nitroshroom

DESCRIPTION: A mushroom that induces paralysis.
NAME: Parashroom

DESCRIPTION: Logic says not to eat this poisonous fungus, but don't write it off completely.
NAME: Toadstool

DESCRIPTION: Thie one has a very strange aroma... Edible? Only one way to find out.
NAME: Exciteshroom

DESCRIPTION: A dangerous fungus said to suck the life out of the one who plucks it. Beware.
NAME: Dragon Toadstool

DESCRIPTION: A berry with a shocking hue and an overwhelming scent. Look out: It WILL stain!
NAME: Paintberry

DESCRIPTION: Temporarily raises your Attack when ingested by improving energy flow.
NAME: Might Seed

DESCRIPTION: Temporarily raises yoru Defense when ingested by hardening tissue.
NAME: Adamant Seed

DESCRIPTION: A berry with a shocking hue and an overwhelming scent. Look out: It WILL stain!
NAME: Paintberry

DESCRIPTION: A mysterious berry that cures all elemental Blights.
NAME: Nulberry

DESCRIPTION: Eat this to cure Dragonblight and temporarily increase Dragon Resistance.
NAME: Dragonfell Berry

DESCRIPTION: A nut that violently ejects its contents when struck.
NAME: Scatternut

DESCRIPTION: A berry covered with needle-like thorns.
NAME: Needleberry

DESCRIPTION: A berry that explodes when struck.
NAME: Bomberry

DESCRIPTION: A trendy orange pumpkin. If left undisturbed, it can grow to gigantic proportions.
NAME: Blumblepumpkin

DESCRIPTION: A rock with just the right heft for throwing. Tried and tested!
NAME: Stone

DESCRIPTION: Ore with high iron content. Can be smelted and forget into various equipment.
NAME: Iron Ore

DESCRIPTION: Crystallized microbes which are prized as an abrasive when forging weapons.
NAME: Earth Crystal

DESCRIPTION: An ore harder than iron, but also several times more difficult to forge with.
NAME: Machalite Ore

DESCRIPTION: An ore that yields metal superior to that of Machalite. Rare and valuable.
NAME: Dragonite Ore

DESCRIPTION: An extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for cragting tools.
NAME: Light Crystal

DESCRIPTION: Ice that will note melt at room temperatures. Can be used to create denser ore.
NAME: Ice Crystal

DESCRIPTION: Combusts even at room temperature. Its high heat can be used to fuse materials.
NAME: Firestone

DESCRIPTION: An extremely hard substance with a faint glow. Sometimes used for cragting tools.
NAME: Light Crystal

DESCRIPTION: An ore still being researched. It yields even better metal than Dragonite.
NAME: Carbalite Ore

DESCRIPTION: An ore composed of a mysterious metal, capable of fusing nearly any two materials together.
NAME: Fucium Ore

DESCRIPTION: A promising new ore that produces higher quality metal than Carbalite Ore.
NAME: Eltalite Ore

DESCRIPTION: An ore composed of a durable, flexible metal that works well as a combining agent.
NAME: Meldspar Ore

DESCRIPTION: A magma-like deposit that only trained hands can properly work with.
NAME: Firecell Stone

DESCRIPTION: An ore that blazes with an all-consuming flame. Requires considerable skill to mine.
NAME: Allfire Stone

DESCRIPTION: A crystal that's 100% pure. Hard enough to be used in workshop tools.
NAME: Purecrystal

DESCRIPTION: Reacts uniquely to heat. Combine with other materials to create coating for armor.
NAME: Armor Stone

DESCRIPTION: Reacts uniquely to heat. Fuse this to armor to increase its strength.
NAME: Armor Sphere

DESCRIPTION: Fuse this high-quality Armor Sphere to existing armor to increase its strength.
NAME: Armor Sphere+

DESCRIPTION: An advanced Armor Sphere. Rare in Moga Village. Save it for that special upgrade.
NAME: Adv Armor Sphere

DESCRIPTION: A thick, dense Armor Sphere. Use this precious rarity to push equipment to the limit.
NAME: Hard Armor Sphere

DESCRIPTION: A thick, dense Armor Sphere. Use this precious rarity to push armor to the limit.
NAME: Heavy Armor Sphere

DESCRIPTION: An Armor Sphere of near-perfect purity. Its abilities require advanced techniques to extract.
NAME: True Armor Sphere

DESCRIPTION: An Armor Sphere with secret power that a true master can harness to upgrade gear.
NAME: Strong Armor Sphere

DESCRIPTION: An Armor Sphere with so much power that all but the most gifted craftsmen keep away.
NAME: Divine Armor Sphere

DESCRIPTION: A fish with a dorsal fin hard enough to sharpen weapons with.
NAME: Whetfish

DESCRIPTION: A fatty, delicious fish that restores a small amount of Health when consumed.
NAME: Sushifish

DESCRIPTION: A fish that contains sleeping agents.
NAME: Sleepyfish

DESCRIPTION: A fish with jaws covered in tiny, needle-like spikes.
NAME: Pin Tuna

DESCRIPTION: A fish that literally pops when it dies.
NAME: Popfish

DESCRIPTION: A fish that dashes itself to pieces when it dies.
NAME: Scatterfish

DESCRIPTION: A fish that burts open when it dies.
NAME: Burst Arowana

DESCRIPTION: A fish that explodes when it dies.
NAME: Bomb Arowana

DESCRIPTION: A fish that eats anything -- allowing you to somtimes get items from its stomach.
NAME: Glutton Tuna

DESCRIPTION: A rare fish that commands a high price, but beware its ferocity, rookies!
NAME: Small Goldenfish

DESCRIPTION: A fish that can induce exhaustion.
NAME: Wanchovy

DESCRIPTION: A fish that emits blue light. Its sharp body will cut you to pieces if you're not careful.
NAME: Blue Cutthroat

DESCRIPTION: The remains of an insect. You must be one hardcore collector to hang onto this!
NAME: Insect Husk

DESCRIPTION: A grasshopper with a foul odor. Make fishing lures with it; its scent drives explosive fish wild.
NAME: Stinkhopper

DESCRIPTION: An unusual larva. Make fishing lures with it; its scent drives Goldenfish wild.
NAME: Snakebee Larva

DESCRIPTION: An insect said to live 1000 years -- but no one's lived long enough to prove it.
NAME: Godbug

DESCRIPTION: Boosts your natural ability to heal when eaten. It also cures poison... sometimes.
NAME: Bitterbug

DESCRIPTION: A nocturnal insect sometimes found in daylight. They emit a bright flash upon death.
NAME: Flashbug

DESCRIPTION: Releases an electric shock when struck. Used to light rooms and start fires.
NAME: Thunderbug

DESCRIPTION: The insect's hard shell is often used as an abrasive.
NAME: Killer Beetle

DESCRIPTION: Said to be the world's strongest bug. Use in forging, cooking, and more.
NAME: Hercudrome

DESCRIPTION: Thunderbugs which have been stimulated by Zinogre. They emit a pale blue light.
NAME: Fulgurbug

DESCRIPTION: A rare and valuable insect that greatly assists in the bonding of metals.
NAME: Rare Scarab

DESCRIPTION: A grasshoper with an exceptionally strong shell. Prized as a crafting material.
NAME: Emperor Hopper

DESCRIPTION: A butterfly with shimmering wings. So rarely seen in the wild, many believe it to be a myth.
NAME: Flutterfly

DESCRIPTION: A strange insect with the large jaws of a beetle and the delicate wings of a butterfly.
NAME: Butterfly Beetle

DESCRIPTION: A hunk of rock? No, it seems to be metal... With a little polish, it could be more.
NAME: Rustshard

DESCRIPTION: A fossil? No, it seems to be metal... With a little polish, it could be more.
NAME: Ancient Shard

DESCRIPTION: A uniquely shaped metal fragment covered in rust. It looks like it could be used for something.
NAME: Rusted Fragment

DESCRIPTION: A map of the hunting ground.
NAME: Map

DESCRIPTION: Restores a tiny bit of Health. It does a body... sort of good!
NAME: First-aid Med

DESCRIPTION: Slightly boosts current/max Stamina. Most hunters agree: it's gross.
NAME: Ration

DESCRIPTION: A Guild-provisioned BBQ Spit useful for novice hunters.
NAME: Portable Spit

DESCRIPTION: A portable Whetstone you can use to sharpend weapons.
NAME: Mini Whestone

DESCRIPTION: Immobilizes a target for easy capture.
NAME: EZ Shock Trap

DESCRIPTION: A grenade-like bomb that flashes brightly on impact.
NAME: EZ Flash Bomb

DESCRIPTION: A powered-up Barrel Bomb L (as potent as a B. Bomb L+). OK underwater.
NAME: EZ Barrel Bomb L

DESCRIPTION: Ammunition for a large mounted Bowgun.
NAME: Ballista Ammo

DESCRIPTION: Ammunition for a large mounted Bowgun. Keep giants from moving!
NAME: Ballista Binder

DESCRIPTION: Special ammunition for an anti-dragon cannon. Not fun to lug around.
NAME: Cannon Ammo

DESCRIPTION: A small time bomb that sticks to targets.
NAME: Anti-dragon Bomb

DESCRIPTION: Use this to light up dark places and stave off certain monsters.
NAME: Torch

DESCRIPTION: Deliver to end the Quest. Maybe the Felynes will take you home...
NAME: Paw Pass Ticket

DESCRIPTION: A pinky-sized mushroom valued for its unusual aroma.
NAME: Unique Mushroom

DESCRIPTION: The perfect shape and aroma. Even better than a Unique Mushroom.
NAME: Choice Mushroom

DESCRIPTION: A unique Mushroom made more unique by maturing its aroma and flavor.
NAME: Ripened Mushroom

DESCRIPTION: A rare fish made of solid gold. Sell it for a tidy sum.
NAME: Goldenfish

DESCRIPTION: A beetle with a jewel-like gleam. Prized by bug fans of all ages.
NAME: Royal Rhino

DESCRIPTION: A unique bone prized in the village for reasons unknown.
NAME: Crystal Bone

DESCRIPTION: Is this crimson stone the relic of some ancient beast?
NAME: Bloodstone

DESCRIPTION: Monster innards galore. A prized delicacy.
NAME: Monster Guts

DESCRIPTION: An egg taken from a flying wyvern's nest. Very fragile, so handle with care.
NAME: Wyvern Egg

DESCRIPTION: An egg stolen from a herbivore's nest. It looks pretty tasty.
NAME: Herbivore Egg

DESCRIPTION: A rock that explodes with even the slightest jolt. Careful!
NAME: Powderstone

DESCRIPTION: Mysterious tears wept only on special occasions.
NAME: Wyvern Tear
